  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, Team team) throws PlayerWithNoTeamException
      Constructor for the Player. It generates an auto-incremented ID that identifies the Player. It also sets its current position as '-1', meaning that it has no associated position at the moment. It also initiates its level as 1 and experience points (xp) as 0. Lastly it creates a list of conquered portals, which will contain each conquered portal by the Player
      Parameters:
      name - Player's name
      team - Team to associate the Player
      Throws:
      PlayerWithNoTeamException - thrown when the Player is created with no associated Team
